Name: Aim Lab
About the game: Looking to improve as an FPS player? Aim Lab has been developed as your personal trainer to help you get better - in more games - through curated aim training scenarios, improving your core FPS skills including flicking, tracking, speed, perception & cognition through detailed aim analysis feedback which guides you on quick improvements. Aim Lab is regularly updated with new features to support more games and is a must for any players, from beginner to pro, to gain a competitive edge. Reasons to train: Official VALORANT VCT training partner Official Rainbow Six Siege development partner Over 12,000 training tasks & scenarios Detailed aim analysis with improvement tips Create unlimited maps, tasks & scenarios in Creator Studio Over 500 FPS/TPS game profiles with a sensitivity convertor to match your settings including VALORANT, Apex Legends, CS:GO, R6S, Call of Duty & more. Test your skills on our leaderboards against other players & dive into our special events Track your improvements over time with your personalized dashboard Great for warming up before hitting ranked! Train your way: Customize your training arena, targets, crosshair, sounds & more Controller & keyboard / mouse support 20+ weapons to train with or create your own! Custom Recoil Patterns What players are saying: “Aim Lab made me not suck at Valorant.” - Someone in Discord “I just love playing Aim Lab. My Wingman shots have definitely improved.' - Lululuvely “Aim Lab removed my left-side weakness” - King George “Why go to the gym when you have Aim Lab?” - Aceu “Aim Lab made me get a girlfriend' - Someone on Twitter
